description: Dormer and two rooflights on front roof slope (following removal of three rooflights); two dormers on rear roof slope (following removal of two dormers); and alterations to the ground floor rear elevational glazing.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: ST_DEC 24_16 MOU_001 (Existing & Proposed Plan & Elevations); ST_DEC 24_16 MOU_003 (Proposed Plans & Sections); ST_DEC 24_16 MOU_004 (Street View).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the approved drawings, the dormers on the front and rear roof slopes shall be finished in lead or a similar material and fitted with sliding sash windows to match the existing. All other external materials shall match the appearance of the existing building. No variations shall be made unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority through the submission of a planning application.

Reason: To ensure appropriate external materials, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of the Ealing draft Local Plan (Regulation 22). | Notwithstanding the approved drawings, the two rooflights on the front roof slope shall be conservation style, lie flush with the roof surface, and be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the character of the host property and conservation area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of the Ealing draft Local Plan (Regulation 22).
